wordNotAscii: This looks like greek to me!
Maybe put it in a language I can understand?
Uhhh... What are you trying to say... Exactly?
Maybe try to save on the spice?
bannedWordAdded: Woah, slow down there! I'm not allowed to say that
STOP! You've violated the law! Pay your fine or do your time in jail. Your stolen goods are now forfeit
Hold it right there, criminal scum!
topic: Here's something to ease the tension!
